Congratulations!

As for jury duty, just make sure you take everything into consideration beforehand.
congratulations and good luck. no more exam and stuff i guess! XD

that's a big achievement, Congradulations!

Good luck in your upcoming life!
Turns out I don't have to be on the jury. Fine by me lol

Congragulations for both of those. And happy 1400th post, too.

Several of my freinds are also graduating from their universities, for me, though, I am simply releived to be done with finals, for the time being....

Good job! Good (luck finding a) job! And if you ever get called for jury duty again, don't try to get out of it; It's your responsibility, your civic duty, and you'll only be called twice or thrice in your life, if that.

Congratulations, and good luck with the job search.

(hoping to graduate at the end of summer here)
Congratulations on your degree in Applied Psychology!
Congrats man! Have a good life!
Congratulations! Auburn is a great school... one hell of a football team!
